manifest.title: Rabit: Burrows for the Agentic Web
manifest.description: Specification and reference implementation for Rabit Burrow Traversal (RBT), a convention for publishing agent-friendly content spaces.

agents.context: This is the official Rabit project repository containing the RBT specification (draft-rabit-rbt-03), a reference client implementation, a Docker-based server with read-only Git server example, and example burrows. The spec now supports file paths (local, SMB, NFS) and .burrow.md companion files.
hints: The specification document (rabit-spec-draft-2026-01-12.md) contains normative requirements marked with RFC 2119 keywords
The rabit-client directory contains a full TypeScript/Bun client implementation with Git, HTTPS, and file path support
The rabit-server directory contains a Docker-based server implementation with a read-only Git server example
The rabit-examples directory contains example burrows with .burrow.md companion files

entries.title: Rabit: Burrows for the Agentic Web
entries.summary: Introduction to Rabit, a specification for publishing content that both humans and AI agents can navigate reliably.

entries.title: Rabit Project Burrow (Human-Readable)
entries.summary: Human-readable companion file for the project burrow, providing navigation and context for humans browsing the repository.

entries.title: RBT Specification Draft
entries.summary: The full technical specification for Rabit Burrow Traversal (RBT) v0.2, defining manifest formats, traversal algorithms, and conformance levels.

entries.title: Rabit Server Documentation
entries.summary: Documentation for the Docker-based rabit-server implementation.

entries.title: Server Dockerfile
entries.summary: Multi-stage Docker build for the rabit-server using Bun and nginx.

entries.title: Server Makefile
entries.summary: Build and deployment automation for rabit-server.

entries.title: Docker Compose Configuration
entries.summary: Quick start Docker Compose configuration for single-burrow setup.

entries.title: Docker Compose Examples
entries.summary: Reference configurations showing various deployment patterns including warren mode, production with Traefik, and private burrows.

entries.title: Docker Entrypoint Script
entries.summary: Container entrypoint that generates nginx configuration and manifests.

entries.title: Manifest Generator
entries.summary: TypeScript script that auto-generates .burrow.json and .warren.json from directory contents.

entries.title: Rabit Examples Documentation
entries.summary: Documentation for example burrows, warren setup, and the proof-of-concept CLI client.

entries.title: Examples Docker Compose
entries.summary: Docker Compose configuration hosting three example burrows and a warren.

entries.title: CORS Configuration
entries.summary: Nginx CORS configuration snippet for the example servers.

entries.title: RBT TypeScript Types
entries.summary: TypeScript type definitions for BurrowManifest, WarrenRegistry, entries, and roots.

entries.title: Rabit Client Library
entries.summary: Core client library with fetch functions for warrens and burrows, traversal logic, and search capabilities.

entries.title: CLI Commands
entries.summary: Command-line interface for interacting with burrows and warrens.
